app.title: Supplementary Materials
app.p: The following are available online at https://www.mdpi.com/2076-393X/7/4/174/s1, Table S1: Details of serum samples analyzed and SRH antibody titers, by category, by regional origin. Table S2: HA amino acid alignment. Figure S1: Number of breeding centers per French region in 2017, all equids considered (race and sport horses, ponies, heavy horses and donkeys).
